revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: New Observations on Italy and its Inhabitants. Written French by Two Swedish Gentlemen. Translated into English by Thomas Nugent, L. L. D. and Fellow of the Society..."
revision.text: Possibly: New Observations on Italy and its Inhabitants. Written French by Two Swedish Gentlemen. Translated into English by Thomas Nugent, L. L. D. and Fellow of the Society of Antiquaries. (Thomas Nugent and Pierre Jean Grosely). 2v. (London : Printed for L. Davis and C. Reymers, Printers to the Royal Society, MDCCLXIX. [1769]) http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2413376~S1.
